    • Constructor Detail

      • SchemeCard

        public SchemeCard(int mapID)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  MapConstrainReadingException
        This method loads a specific scheme card from a .txt file
        Parameters:
        mapID - The id corresponding to the map I want to load
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown in case we encounter some problems when trying to read the constrains from the file
        MapConstrainReadingException - Exception thrown if we encounter some problem in interpreting the scheme card's constrains

    • Method Detail

      • setTwinCard

        public void setTwinCard(SchemeCard schemeCard)
        Each scheme card has two faces with a different board, this method allows you to set the twin cards
        Parameters:
        schemeCard - Scheme card we want as twin

      • setDice

        public void setDice(Dice dice,
                    int row,
                    int column,
                    boolean IgnoreColor,
                    boolean IgnoreNumber,
                    boolean IgnoreThereisaDiceNearYou)
             throws OutOfMatrixException,
                    TileConstrainException
        This method allows to place a given dice in a specific tile. With specific parameters we can also control which level of constrain we want when placing the dice.
        Parameters:
        dice - The dice we want to place
        row - In which row we want to place the dice
        column - In which column we want to place the dice
        IgnoreColor - Boolean value whether we want to consider or not the color constrain
        IgnoreNumber - Boolean value whether we want to consider or not the intensity constrain
        IgnoreThereisaDiceNearYou - Boolean value whether we want to consider or not the constrain in placing the dice next to another one
        Throws:
        OutOfMatrixException - Exception thrown when we try to place a dice in a position out of the scheme card
        TileConstrainException - Exception thrown when some constrain isn't respected

      • SettableHere

        public boolean SettableHere(Dice dice,
                            int row,
                            int column,
                            boolean IgnoreColor,
                            boolean IgnoreNumber)
        Method particularly useful for "Pennello per pasta Salda" tool card. It returns true if we can set the dice in the specified position
        Parameters:
        dice - The dice we would like to place
        row - In which row we want to place the dice
        column - In which column we want to place the dice
        IgnoreColor - Boolean value whether we want to consider or not the color constrain
        IgnoreNumber - Boolean value whether we want to consider or not the intensity constrain
        Returns:

      • getDiceColour

        public DiceColor getDiceColour(int row,
                               int column)
                        throws OutOfMatrixException,
                               DiceNotExistantException
        Returns the color of the dice in the specified position
        Parameters:
        row - Row where the dice is placed
        column - Column where the dice is placed
        Returns:
        The color of the dice
        Throws:
        OutOfMatrixException - Exception thrown in case we specify a position out from the scheme card
        DiceNotExistantException - Exception thrown in case we specify a position with no dice in it

      • ThereisaDicenearYou

                                   int column)
        This method checks if in the 8 tiles around one we specify there is at least one dice.
        Parameters:

        column - Column where we want to check
        Returns:
